title: wine_Ebner-Ebenauer_2007_Blanc_de_Blancs_Chardonnay_(Österreichischer_Sekt)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 74237.
country: Austria.
description: Lovely red apple and biscuit notes emanate here to create the perfect balance between fruit and yeasty autolysis. Acidity streamlines the generous, full-fruited body while soft mousse amplifies all the rich, layered apple flavors. The midpalate texture and finish are impressive. This is the full, delicious package and will make a classy apéritif with enough character to accompany delicate, fine cuisine. The length speaks for itself: pure class. Zero dosage..
designation: Blanc de Blancs.
points: 93.
price: 49.0.
province: Österreichischer Sekt.

region_2: .
taster_name: Anne Krebiehl MW.
